text: Jozef P. A. "Jos" Chabert (16 March 1933 - 9 April 2014) was a Belgian politician for Christen-Democratisch en Vlaams (Christian Democratic and Flemish; CD&V;). He was a Minister of State from 24 November 2009 until his death. Before this, he was a member of the Parliament of the Brussels-Capital Region. He was born in Etterbeek, Brussels-Capital Region. From 1965 to 1976 he was an alderman of Meise. Chabert died on 9 April 2014 in Brussels, aged 81. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Brussels-Capital Region politicians Category:Christelijke Volkspartij politicians Category:Christen-Democratisch en Vlaams politicians Category:Disease-related deaths in Belgium Category:Flemish politicians Category:Government ministers of Belgium Category:People from Brussels-Capital Region
title: Jos Chabert
